Title: Tips for Creating Moments Your Customers Won’t Forget with Jesse Cole
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Jesse Cole, the founder of Fans First Entertainment and owner of the Savannah Bananas baseball team. Jesse has an inspiring story that started with an empty baseball stadium on the brink of closing. Now that same stadium is home to a team that’s selling out nationwide tours with raving fans all over the country. Later in the episode, George chats with Joe Leavitt, the director of event production at Ramsey Solutions, about Joe’s process for creating memorable experiences—and how you can do the same for your team and your customers.

 

You’ll learn:

  • Why wowing your fans is crucial
  • The question that vision-driven leaders ask
  • How to create unforgettable events
  • Easy ways to make fantastic customer experiences
